p:
All the genes detected for a comparison were ranked according to their log2 fold change in expression regardless of statistical significance. GSEA was performed using the Java-based GSEA software (version 3.0) on this ranked gene lists against the entire MSigDB database (version 6.1)
27, 28 . with 1000 permutations; significance was achieved for a q-value less than or equal to 0.25, per the GSEA developers recommended practices.
